solution_line_template: The {num_fishermen_group_1} fishermen who caught {fish_per_fisherman_group_1} fish each caught {fish_per_fisherman_group_1}*{num_fishermen_group_1} = <<{fish_per_fisherman_group_1}*{num_fishermen_group_1}={total_fish_group_1}>>{total_fish_group_1} fish.

If they caught a total of {total_fish_caught} fish, the twentieth fisherman caught {total_fish_caught}-{total_fish_group_1} = <<{total_fish_caught}-{total_fish_group_1}={fish_twentieth_fisherman}>>{fish_twentieth_fisherman} fish alone.
